div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1266 Fethiye (formerly Makri; anc. Tel- (641) messus), Lycia, 1929 Burial: c. 340 B.C. (M) Contents: 67 AR Ephesus: 49 tetradr. Mausolus: 12 tetradr. Hidrieus: 5 tetradr. Cos: 1 tetradr. Disposition: London 36; Oxford 31 Hill, NC 1930, p. 285
